title: 【武漢肺炎】歐盟對外事務部：中國及俄羅斯散播大量有利自己嘅fake news

replies.msg:
https://euvsdisinfo.eu/eeas-special-report-update-short-assessment-of-narratives-and-disinformation-around-the-covid-19-pandemic/

重點：
中國：官媒以及政府官員推廣有關病毒源頭的理論，此等理論未經證實。中國新聞亦著眼報導部分歐洲領袖對於中國援助的感恩。
（China: state media and government officials promote not proven theories about the origin of COVID-19. Chinese coverage highlights displays of gratitude by some European leaders in response to Chinese aid.）
例如聲稱病毒源頭來自美軍或者意大利
（In the Chinese information space, there are attempts to suggest for instance that it was brought to Wuhan by US military personnel, or that it may have originated in Italy.）

中國官媒及社交平台不斷吹奏中國模式應對武漢肺炎嘅優勢，同時著重描寫國際間（包括意大利）對中國援助嘅感恩。不少專家指中國嘅目標除左塑造好嘅國際形象以外，整體目標係維持國內社會穩定。
（Chinese state-controlled media and social media channels strongly promoted the idea that the Chinese model is superior in tackling COVID-19, while highlighting global expressions of gratitude for Chinese aid delivery, including in Italy. Many experts argue that besides crafting a better international image, China’s overall goal is to maintain social stability at home.）

中國利用虛假及駭客入侵嘅twitter 帳戶網絡，散播武漢肺炎不實資訊，分析見https://www.propublica.org/article/how-china-built-a-twitter-propaganda-machine-then-let-it-loose-on-coronavirus




俄羅斯：歐盟對抗假新聞嘅資料庫中，自1月22日紀錄左多過150宗有利俄羅斯政府嘅新聞。俄羅斯國家控制嘅媒體將焦點轉移至俄羅斯有幾充足準備應對疫情爆發，亦都大篇幅報導俄羅斯對義大利之援助。
（Russia: More than 150 cases of pro-Kremlin disinformation on COVID-19 have been recorded in the EUvsDisinfo database (since January 22). Russian state-controlled media outlets have shifted their focus to highlight Russia’s preparedness to tackle the outbreak. Russian aid to Italy was extensively covered.）
並且幫手吹奏中國制度
（pro-Kremlin sources also depicted the Chinese “global project” as superior to the EU. ）
而家先知？原來香港人仲勁過歐盟對外事務部
